level.heading: Prosecution.
level.text: All violations of this subchapter shall be prosecuted by the Corporation Counsel of the District of Columbia or his or her designee in the name of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Sept. 23, 1977, D.C. Law 2-22, title II, ยง 209, 24 DCR 3341.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-22
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-22, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 4-1301.02.
